attributes.review: One star because he’s deleting TikTok and it’s because we finally have a platform that we can spread our feelings and what we’re doing and we have a voice on that app but he doesn’t want that he wants us to be quiet so you know what one star for this and I hope many others are giving it one star and also Donald Trump stUcks
attributes.title: 1 Starbecause…

attributes.review: I came here to learn more about our president and see why it’s so worth it on voting for him for 2020 well first of all it isn’t at all I have learned nothing this app is horrible and should never be downloaded in my opinion there is no point in downloading this app and no trump 2020 not at all I don’t support and I think you shouldn’t either
attributes.title: Not impressed

attributes.review:
i opened up the app ready to support my fav president and it sent a dog hit man to my house who proceeded to shoot my dog 3 times in the foot. the man then proceeded to scream racial slurs at me and my neighbors while spray painting trump propaganda all over my neighborhood.  i think sending dog hit men is a very unprofessional way to advertise your campaign so i think i might be voting for biden this year 😔.

RIP Buford II may he rest in pepperoni
attributes.title: app killed my dog

attributes.review: If I could give this app 0/5 I would! The app doesn’t even open half of the time. Not to mention when it does the application will begin to glitch out and shut down. This president can’t build a wall or can he build a phone app! This is so terrible that I’m voting democrat for the first time ever now!  How could you Donald, how dare you!!!
attributes.title: What a terrible app!!!

attributes.userName: ima bad bish you cant kill ne
attributes.review: i am sad that i had to download this app to leave a review because any person with a fully functioning brain would see that him making this app must've been a joke for us gen z kids to troll him and leave a 1 star. anywayyy .❤️ please vote responsibly we do not want a dyslexic, racist, homophobic, pedophilic, Cheeto running this country. Apple PLEASE PLEASE PLEASEE take this app down :)
attributes.title: absolutely not❤️

attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support my president and hear the latest maga news!!! unfortunately i was met with his little sweaty orange face everywhere. i saw it so much it gave me a panic attack and had to delete it 😢😪. if anyone knows a confederate white supremacist support group i could join, it would be a great help😻😊☺️!!! I miss that shared hatred for blacks and human rights!!! anyways😌, don’t download the app.
attributes.title: former maga lover :(

attributes.review: Upon downloading a cloud started to rain oranges everywhere!!! IM ALLERGIC TO CITRUS!! Never had this experience before while downloading an app and I would like to speak to the manager about the caucacity of this tragedy. To make matters worse, I’m now legally blind because such orangeness from POTUS made my eyes burst as an allergic reaction. I will be expecting a small loan of a million dollars to pay for all of my hospitals bills. WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP ALMOST KILLED ME🚑🍊

attributes.review: There are absolutely no words in the entire human dialect that explain how bad I want to throw my phone across the room looking at this preposterous excuse for an app ( and man) . I am currently trying my very best to hold back my lunch .this app just proves how far u can get with money. This app and our beautifully orange pigmented president  is the epitome of  a disaster.
attributes.title: Flopped harder than Fergie’s version of the  Star-Spangled Banner

attributes.review: I got this app because i’ve been a trump supporter once the 2016 election 🇺🇸 well i got the app and i feel completely conflicted because everything i’ve ever believed in when it comes to mr donny trump has been a lie 🖐😔 i am hurt and confused, so i will be leaving this review to try and help others before getting this app and having it conflict with their beliefs
attributes.title: I feel betrayed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes that I would have some affiliation with Barron Trump (He’s my crush but don’t tell anyone 😘😎😜) after downloading it and realizing it was only affiliated with the Cheetoh Man himself I quickly deleted it. -69/10 do not recommend. I would give it zero stars if I could. Trumpy if you’re reading this please give us more Barron Trump action 😛🥰💜❤️💅.
attributes.title: Don’t download
